@rayvenyor if it's want to update, then just click on it. (if you're having pirated version, replace the .exe and the tslhost.dll file with your original! Then update. After the update, you should backup your original 2 files, then patch with no-dvd patch. It will work, and allow you to install the store items via the launcher!) Hope this helps.
